doc.title: Insomnia
doc.plot: Alternative entertainment and music program airing over sixty shows featuring guest such as Beck, Cake, Dandy Warhols, Everclear, Fishbone, Poe, John Cale, Luscious Jackson, Pond, Run DMC, Peter Buck (REM), Dishwalla, Krist Novoselic (Nirvana), Primitive Radio Gods, Built To Spill, Emergency Broadcast Network, Fun Lovin'Criminals, Ice-T and The Refreshments.
